PATIENT_ID: TEST_BURNS_003
ARRIVAL_TIME: 2026-02-08 18:00:00

[TRAUMA_HP] 2026-02-08 18:10:00
Category I activation for 50-year-old male. Thermal injury from workplace
accident. Burn sustained. Burn mechanism not fully documented.
Extent of burns unclear. GCS 15.
BP 110/70, HR 96, RR 18.

[PHYSICIAN_NOTE] 2026-02-08 18:30:00
Burns noted to trunk and extremities.
No TBSA assessment documented. No total body surface area estimation.
No depth assessment documented.
No specific burn location mapping completed.
No inhalation assessment documented.
Awaiting full burn team evaluation.
